misc: Always a gentleman despite occasionally losing his temper on the course
biography: Daniel is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Oulujokilaakson Golfklubi ry. His presence is always noted, not just for his skill on the course but also for his complex personality. While he maintains the demeanor of a gentleman, those who have witnessed his occasional flare-ups understand that he is a fierce competitor.

Over the years, Daniel has participated in 7 Hector Trophée tournaments, securing the coveted Hector Trophée on 2 occasions. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his consistent performance and dedication suggest that he remains a strong contender in every event he enters.

Although Daniel is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, fans remain hopeful for a change. His experience and passion for the game are undeniable assets to any team, and his absence would certainly be felt. Whether he appears in the upcoming tournament or not, Daniel's mark on the Hector Trophée is indelible.
